amendment.description: To increase funds for the Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight to conduct audits, investigations and examinations and to provide for additional emergency funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2174 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2174 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14510-14511; text: CR S14510) To increase funds for the Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight to conduct audits, investigations and examinations and to provide for additional emergency funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2174 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2174 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2150.
